name: Backwards
description:
A small platformer on a spaceship. The ships been overrun with Spikey Turtles. Blow them up with bombs and pick up the door keys to navigate your way through the levels.

Throw bombs, Climb walls and Double Jump your way to the finish.

1 to Throw Bombs

E to teleport (when the mana meter is full)

F to Slam (while in the air)

Made by Dan Davison and Dan Waller https://sir-jaffacake-iv.itch.io/
